welcome_message_body: "Welcome to San Cesareo, a charming town known for its beautiful landscapes, delicious cuisine, and rich history. We hope you enjoy your time here and take the opportunity to explore all that our city has to offer. Buon viaggio!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ciampino Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for charter and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for budget airlines and some domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newer terminal for international flights, with modern amenities and shopping options.

wifi.note: Limited free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Premium high-speed WiFi is available for purchase.
